QuestData.Title: Imminent Danger
QuestData.Description:
The Temple of Courage must not fall!
All kyrian learn to fight in its hallowed halls. Not only to protect Bastion, but to ensure their own safety when retrieving souls from across the veil.
Travel there at once. Seek out Thanikos, the Paragon of Courage's loyal hand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Thanikos at Xandria's Vigil.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Seek out Thanikos at Xandria's Vigil.
QuestData.RewardText: Not quite the army I hoped would come, but I welcome your blade by my side.

Objectives.Objective: Fly to the Temple of Courage
